name: A Hole New World
description: The city is being invaded by monsters from the Upside Down World! You, the Potion Master, must defeat evil all alone, with no tutorials or "Easy Mode" to assist you. You'll have to rely on the help of FÃ¤y, your companion fairy, and your potions!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 (or later) Processor: 1,60 Ghz Intel Atom Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card Storage: 950 MB available space
